resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Finir vogl[i]o (la) mya vita / Cum pianti he [con] dolore / Da poi ch’el myo segnore m’a tradita. / Lassa my pov(e)rella / Che m’a lassata trista tapinella.
resource.chars: Finir vogl[i]o (la) mya vita / Cum pianti he [con] dolore / Da poi ch’el myo segnore m’a tradita. / Lassa my pov(e)rella / Che m’a lassata trista tapinella.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M727.08373,501.74641h720.92105v0h720.92105v512.67943v512.67943h-720.92105h-720.92105v-512.67943z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_3939872e-e901-42c6-90d5-a34fc67b3df1" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Cara mya pellegrina, dolce, preciossa / Per dyo te prego in quanto bene te vogl[i]o / De no me fare tanta pena durare.
resource.chars: Cara mya pellegrina, dolce, preciossa / Per dyo te prego in quanto bene te vogl[i]o / De no me fare tanta pena durare.

item.value: <svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'><path xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" d="M965.07416,1544.9378h504.74641v0h504.74641v94.21292v94.21292h-504.74641h-504.74641v-94.21292z" data-paper-data="{"strokeWidth":1,"rotation":0,"deleteIcon":null,"rotationIcon":null,"group":null,"editable":true,"annotation":null}" id="rectangle_6e74ba60-938d-4672-bc6f-ca7422ae4c3b" fill-opacity="0" fill="#00bfff" fill-rule="nonzero" stroke="#00bfff" stroke-width="1" stroke-linecap="butt" stroke-linejoin="miter" stroke-miterlimit="10" stroke-dasharray="" stroke-dashoffset="0" font-family="none" font-weight="none" font-size="none" text-anchor="none" style="mix-blend-mode: normal"/></svg>

resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: Tu my poi dare piacere. Tu my poi dare conforto. / Ma enverso de me seytanto felle de che n’aytorto. / Prego pietade ty prenda le mye pene.
resource.chars: Tu my poi dare piacere. Tu my poi dare conforto. / Ma enverso de me seytanto felle de che n’aytorto. / Prego pietade ty prenda le mye pene.
